content:
And um, I'll be sleeping near the Camp,
so I can keep an eye on the goods at all times,
and watch Captain Mo too- ah! I mean, just to learn from them! <style=SizeSmall>That's all...</style>
info: 回到帐篷-格连_格连任务闲聊

content:
All the supplies I need for the shop,
Every little thing is finally here!
info: 回到帐篷-格连_格连任务闲聊

content:
I found a bunch of forgotten charcoal-roasted coffee cups deep in the boxes! What a wonderful surprise.
       <size=30>Their color was so good at hiding, I didn't even notice them at all...</size>
info: 回到帐篷-格连_格连任务闲聊

content:
So, I've been trying to stock up on supplies,
but I can't seem to find a drink called Soda Pop-Pop anywhere.
       <size=30>Maybe I got the name wrong...?</size>
info: 回到帐篷-格连_格连任务闲聊

content:
I've even connected with neighboring shops along the Astralink,
and we're exchanging goods...
And then...!
info: 回到帐篷-格连_格连任务闲聊

content:
This is my first time being a trainee coordinator...
I was nervous, worried that I picked the wrong tent,
but now I can relax!
info: 回到帐篷-格连_格连任务闲聊

content: If I went through that turbulence and experienced Sani's "driving skills," and drank Captain Mo's huge bowl of tea... I think I'd sleep straight through till tomorrow noon... <style=SizeSmall>*yawns quietly*</style>
info: 回到帐篷-格连_格连任务闲聊

content:
Hm? Those stacked-up boxes over there?
They're all empty boxes.
       <size=30>Even stacking empty ones brings me joy...</size>
info: 回到帐篷-格连_格连任务闲聊

content: Just between the two of us, Sani seems to really like a drink called Soda Pop-Pop.
info: 回到帐篷-格连_格连任务闲聊

content:
The scratched kettle got a fresh coat,
The dented floor lamp just needed a new bulb,
And the snagged carpet's been rewoven good as new.
info: 回到帐篷-格连_格连任务闲聊

content:
<color=#d3b037>{me}</color>, I have good news!
Among the goods that arrived with you all,
I've managed to collect all the damaged items.
info: 回到帐篷-格连_格连任务闲聊

content:
Thank you <color=#d3b037>{me}</color> for helping Frostia!
I was really worried about picking the right place to live,
I'm so glad you could help.
